item.description:
Come Celebrate India's Independence .. @ Caprice Lounge on Friday Aug 17th.


COLORS OF INDIA - Bhangra Bollywood Dance Party at the Best Spot in downtown Boston! Come with friends!!

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Where: CAPRICE LOUNGE

Mark the Date: FRIDAY, August 17th, 2012

Doors at 10:30 PM
Get ready to dance and party!! Tickets are only $10. Early Bird Tickets & Group Discounts on Sale now! Get your tickets before we are SOLD OUT @ www.GenerationDesi.com
Music Provided by: Dj Laloo from Midnight Productions spinning Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Desi remixes all night long

Plenty off Street parking & parking lot right opposite. All our events sell out! Dont miss it!! Limited Space!

Don't be left out. Tix or http://​www.Generationdesi.com/
or RSVP: Generationdesi@gmail.com or Cover: $10 on the Guestlist.
item.name: COLORS OF INDIA INDEPENDENCE DAY PARTY @ CAPRICE
